meanings.definition: Intimidating or overwhelming in size or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: The daunting task of climbing the tall mountain scared me.
meanings.sent2: The students found the daunting math problem challenging.
meanings.sent3: Facing the daunting pile of laundry, she decided to dance instead.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds cast a daunting shadow over the small town.
meanings.sent5: The dragon's roar echoed through the valley, a daunting sound.

meanings.sent1: The haunted house had a daunting atmosphere that made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The loud thunder was daunting to the scared puppy.
meanings.sent3: The daunting spider on the wall sent the cat running in circles.
meanings.sent4: The daunting silence in the room made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The daunting ghost stories around the campfire kept us up all night.
